function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Inclusion of individuals with chronic conditions and psychiatric conditions in the study sample","Impact":"Risk of bias in the study findings, as individuals with chronic and psychiatric conditions may have different disease propagation patterns","Mitigation":"Conduct sub-group analysis for individuals with chronic and psychiatric conditions to understand their impact on disease propagation","Technologies":"Statistical analysis tools for sub-group analysis","People":"Individuals with chronic conditions and psychiatric conditions","Owner":"Research team"},{"Description":"Extrapolation of results to the entire Danish population based on a sample of 3508 individuals","Impact":"Risk of overgeneralization, as the sample may not accurately represent the entire population","Mitigation":"Use stratified sampling techniques to ensure representation of different demographics in the population","Technologies":"Stratified sampling methods","People":"Entire Danish population","Owner":"Research team"},{"Description":"Use of confidence intervals to generate lower and upper bound estimates","Impact":"Risk of misinterpretation of results if the confidence intervals are not adequately considered","Mitigation":"Provide clear explanations of the confidence intervals and their implications on the extrapolated estimates","Technologies":"Statistical analysis tools for confidence interval interpretation","People":"Data analysts, researchers, policymakers","Owner":"Research team"}]}
